statements: SELECT * FROM vendor_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, key_terms FROM vendor_contracts WHERE renewal_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT vendor_name, renewal_date FROM vendor_contracts WHERE performance_benchmarks LIKE '%exceed%';
SELECT * FROM vendor_contracts ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_contracts FROM vendor_contracts WHERE vendor_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT * FROM vendor_contracts WHERE renewal_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT contract_id, vendor_name, key_terms FROM vendor_contracts WHERE performance_benchmarks LIKE '%high%' AND renewal_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT vendor_name, key_terms FROM vendor_contracts ORDER BY contract_id ASC LIMIT 3 OFFSET 1;
SELECT vendor_name, key_terms, renewal_date FROM vendor_contracts WHERE vendor_name = 'ABC Corp' AND key_terms IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM vendor_contracts WHERE key_terms LIKE '%important%' OR performance_benchmarks LIKE '%exceeded%' AND renewal_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM vendor_contracts
SELECT contract_id, key_terms, renewal_date FROM vendor_contracts
SELECT * FROM vendor_performance ORDER BY metric_date DESC
SELECT vendor_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM vendor_performance WHERE metric_value > 0
SELECT vendor_id, metric_name, metric_date FROM vendor_performance WHERE metric_name LIKE 'operating%'
SELECT * FROM vendor_contracts WHERE contract_id = 10;
SELECT key_terms, renewal_date FROM vendor_contracts WHERE renewal_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM vendor_performance WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_contracts WHERE performance_benchmarks LIKE '%improvement%' AND key_terms IS NOT NULL;
SELECT vendor_id, AVG(metric_value) AS average_value FROM vendor_performance GROUP BY vendor_id HAVING AVG(metric_value) > 50;
SELECT * FROM VendorContracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, renewal_date FROM VendorContracts WHERE vendor_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT contract_id, key_terms FROM VendorContracts ORDER BY contract_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ContractRenewal WHERE renewal_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT vendor_name, performance_benchmarks FROM VendorContracts WHERE vendor_name = 'XYZ Inc';
SELECT vendor_name, renewal_date FROM VendorContracts ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, key_terms FROM VendorContracts WHERE vendor_name = 'XYZ Corp';
SELECT vendor_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM VendorContracts JOIN PerformanceMetrics ON VendorContracts.contract_id = PerformanceMetrics.contract_id;
SELECT * FROM ContractRenewal LEFT JOIN VendorContracts ON ContractRenewal.contract_id = VendorContracts.contract_id;
SELECT vendor_name, key_terms FROM VendorContracts WHERE performance_benchmarks LIKE '%benchmark1%';
SELECT * FROM vendor_contracts;
SELECT vendor_name, key_terms FROM vendor_contracts WHERE renewal_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM contract_terms ORDER BY term_id DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, renewal_date FROM vendor_contracts WHERE vendor_name = 'Vendor A' OR vendor_name = 'Vendor B';
SELECT contract_id, COUNT(term_id) AS num_terms FROM contract_terms GROUP BY contract_id HAVING num_terms > 5;
SELECT contract_id, vendor_name, key_terms FROM vendor_contracts;
SELECT * FROM vendor_contracts ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, key_terms FROM vendor_contracts WHERE renewal_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT contract_id, term_text FROM vendor_contracts JOIN contract_terms ON vendor_contracts.contract_id = contract_terms.contract_id;
SELECT vendor_name, renewal_date FROM vendor_contracts JOIN contract_renewals ON vendor_contracts.contract_id = contract_renewals.contract_id WHERE vendor_name LIKE '%Corp%';
SELECT * FROM vendor_contracts;
SELECT vendor_name, renewal_date FROM vendor_contracts ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, key_terms FROM vendor_contracts WHERE vendor_name = 'ABC Inc';
SELECT vendor_name, key_terms, renewal_date FROM vendor_contracts WHERE renewal_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT vendor_name, performance_benchmarks->>'uptime' AS uptime_percentage FROM vendor_contracts WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM vendor_contracts LIMIT 5;
SELECT vendor_name, renewal_date FROM vendor_contracts WHERE renewal_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT contract_terms.term_description, contract_terms.term_value, vendor_contracts.vendor_name FROM contract_terms JOIN vendor_contracts ON contract_terms.contract_id = vendor_contracts.id;

SELECT contract_renewals.renewal_date, vendor_contracts.vendor_name FROM contract_renewals JOIN vendor_contracts ON contract_renewals.contract_id = vendor_contracts.id WHERE contract_renewals.renewal_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT vendor_name, performance_benchmarks FROM vendor_contracts WHERE performance_benchmarks->>'key_metric' = 'value';
